name: maze_game_95
description:
Despite all the craze, I am still just a rat in a maze

Remember that old Windows 95/98 Maze screensaver? The one with the rat and the bricks? Well, what if you could play it? NOW YOU CAN!

From a Classic no-frills mode for the casual  Maze-Goers to a maze-Venture mode for avid Labyrinthusiasts, this game has it all... if by 'all' you mean Mazes, and by 'mazes' you mean mazes. Or try your luck and skill with the Challenge mode to unlock secret Logins!

See full_credits.txt located in the game folder for ALL credits (including the spoiler-y ones). I also included a "physical" copy of the in-game readme.txt in case the text is hard to read.
